code: import{createSelector}from"reselect";var selectShop=function selectShop(state){return state.shop;};export var selectCollections=createSelector([selectShop],function(shop){return shop.collections;});export var selectCollection=function selectCollection(collectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){return collections[collectionUrlParam];});};export var selectCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectCollections],function(collections){console.log(collections);return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});
